titleStmt.title: Roman-Catholick principles, in reference to God and the King explained in a letter to a friend, and now made publick, to shew the connexion between the said principles, and the late Popish Plot. By a well-wisher of his countrey.
titleStmt.author: Corker, James Maurus, 1636-1715.
M. B.

notesStmt.note: A well-wisher of his countrey = James Maurus Corker, though the work is signed at end: M.B. -- Wing (CD-ROM edition).
The last leaf bears the text of Psalm 35:11 and of Matthew 5:11.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
